title: FAST COMPANY SERIF and SANS SERIF
content:
Please help to ID both fonts.  
Thank you.

author: mkstudio

comments.content: "COULD THIS..." looks like **[Kaiser Condensed Web](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160623/http:/www.christianschwartz.com/kaiser.shtml)** [Commercial Type, 2011] probably a bit emboldened

Just found this page too - for more examples and info.  
Thanks fvilanakis and elimpprrrt!

[http://typedeck.com/fast-company-fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160623/http:/typedeck.com/fast-company-fonts/ "http://typedeck.com/fast-company-fonts/")

Kommissar is a retail versioin of Kaiser and Duplicate Slab is a retail version of Zizou Slab.  
 [http://vllg.com/schwartzco](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160623/http:/vllg.com/schwartzco "http://vllg.com/schwartzco")  
 [https://commercialtype.com/typefaces/duplicate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416160623/https:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/duplicate "https://commercialtype.com/typefaces/duplicate")
